name: Casinex Sports Holding AS
description: We are a company that is involved in the sports industry, managing & representing athletes. We also provide consultancy assistance for companies in sports as a whole, as well as investments in other securities, financial instruments and companies and activities that fall below this.

team.title: CCO
team.name: Robert Luke Elden
team.bioHtml: Director of Marketing @ TwinRayj Studios | Top 20 Puzzle Games on Google Play | $0-$100k online sales in 9 months | Over 18 Million organic social reach in 2019

jobs.title: Chief Financial Officer (CFO)
jobs.description:
We are looking for an experienced CFO whose main task will be to successfully secure seed investment/funding. 

With this role your other responsibilities will be managing the company’s finances, including financial planning, management of financial risks, record keeping and financial reporting of the parent company holdings.
 
This is a great opportunity inside the sports industry for the right person, who is looking to make an exciting forward step in their career.
